newsitem.title: USA: Genta vice chairman Blair resigns.
newsitem.headline: Genta vice chairman Blair resigns.

text.p: Genta Inc said James Blair has resigned his position as director and as vice chairman of the board of directors of the company in a letter to the company's chairman Thomas Adams.

"I am resigning due to my perception that I have irreconcilably different views than those held by you and the majority of the board as to the proper program to resolve the financial and strategic issues which Genta faces," the letter said.
The company was not immediately available to discuss its plans for finding a replacement for Blair.
